segments.text: So Beth , what kind of music do you listen to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I listen to a lot of hip hop . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I mostly listen to pop music , but I like a lot of different stuff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , me too . I mostly listen to hip hop , but there are many genres of music I like .
segments.speaker: S2
